I work mostly with Nodejs and Kubernetes in my day-to-day, and as such, you'll see a few tools below I've built over time to solve *personal itches*. If any of the applications you see are valuable to you or have any feedback, please do not hesitate to create an issue in their respective repository, or message me on Twitter: [@jairoAFernandez](https://x.com/jairoAFernandez). I'm always looking forward to feedback!
